comment.author: 52581810@N02
comment._content: Standard steam engine of a type which was in use with brick factories, road builders, etc. all over Europe between the twenties and the fifties. They were very practical after the war when in many German cities narrow gauge tracks were laid in the streets on which small trains were used to transport the rubble of the bombarded houses. Thousands of these small locos have been built by companies like Jung, Hanomag, Henschel and others.
